body:
We want to default to disabling updating generated files during hot restart and add an option to turn this on for all projects if desired. (A user could enable this feature globally in settings but manually add a flag to disable for a particular project)

This setting is only visible for bazel projects.

comment_data.body: Should I add a message or notification if this flag is in additional args? Could be useful if we want users to stop managing this themselves so we can switch over to default enabled when it's working more consistently in the future.
Yes that is a good idea.

lets actually swap this around and add a new 
--enable-google3-hot-restart param to the bazel integration.

That way we can change the default in bazel to use the more robust external work flows. Otherwise, only IDE users will benefit from the more robust experience by default.
Nit: this makes it sound like hot restart is disabled rather than just "Google3 specific hot restart"

commit.message: Disable bazel hot restart by default
Add enable flag and notification for disabled arg
Show notification about default change first time

repo.description: Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful mobile apps.
repo.name: flutter-intellij

title: Disable bazel hot restart by default
